title: Oops! Dreamy-Smooth Hummus
description:
Referenced in this episode:

  • Whipped Hummus With Roasted Carrots & Za'atar Oil recipe
  • Dreamy-Smooth Hummus From a Kitchen Oops (Food52)

 

Genius-Hunter Extra Credit:

  • Everything you ever wanted to know about magical bean water, aquafaba
  • Hetty's podcast, The House Specials
  • View transcript

Have a genius recipe you'd like to share? Tell me all about it! I'm at genius@food52.com.
author: podcasts@food52.com (Hetty McKinnon, Kristen Miglore)

itunes:title: Oops! Dreamy-Smooth Hummus
itunes:author: Hetty McKinnon, Kristen Miglore
itunes:summary: Cookbook author, recipe developer, podcaster, and salad-slinger Hetty McKinnon joins host Kristen Miglore to talk aquafaba magic, Hetty's secret double life in Sydney, and why it took a 9000-mile journey away to get closer to home.
